paragraphs: I’m a developer passionate about crafting accessible, pixel-perfect user interfaces that blend thoughtful design with robust engineering. My favorite work lies at the intersection of design and development, creating experiences that not only look great but are meticulously built for performance and usability.
My work focuses on performance, scalability, and usability, with experience building production applications using modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue.
Outside of work, I enjoy climbing, playing tennis, and experimenting with new technologies—always looking for ways to improve both developer and user experiences.
